Liyue
The Harbor of Stone and Contracts

Exclusive unique Governor with various abilities. Commercial Hub and Harbor gain standard [ICON_Gold] Gold adjacency bonus from adjacent districts. +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity in every city with a Market and a Lighthouse building. Trade Routes sent to your cities grant +5 [ICON_Gold] Gold. Resources improved by Mines and Quarries gain +1 [ICON_Production] Production each. Additional +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold for Luxuries improved by Mines and Quarries.

Keqing
Yuheng, the Star of Change

+2 [ICON_Movement] Movement for all civilian units. Civilian units ignore [ICON_Movement] Movement costs of terrain, features and crossing rivers. Builders receive 2 less build charges. Receive 2 additional Builders or Military Engineers each time you train one. One extra Wildcard policy slot in any government.

Keqing, Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing, the future of Liyue lies in your hands. You are representation of your people, and make your decisions lightning fast like a driving thunder. Under your leadership, your people will rewrite the old order existed for millennia, replace the gods as masters of your own universe, and stand the test of time. Stay at the cutting edge of era, create a new path with your own hands, and make your thoughts into actions.
Ningguang
Tian Quan Ningguang -- Businessman who knows everything

Ningguang has 1 level diplomatic visibility to anyone else. Her spy gets "SURVEILLANCE" and "POLYGRAPH" promotions initially. [NEWLINE]Gets double [ICON_Favor] Favor as the suzerain of a city state, doubles the first [ICON_Envoy] envoy sent to a city state. [NEWLINE]Ninnguang can buy Traders for free, and has 20% off when buying a building with [ICON_Gold]Gold. +5 [ICON_Gold] Gold from Trade routes passing Liyue cities.[NEWLINE]Extra [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant Point from Commercial Hub and Harbor, each 2 adjacent bonus these districts have will get 20% [ICON_Gold]Gold bonus, Max bonus is 10.

"Tian Quan" Ningguang, you have no opponent in commercial battles, you know everything happending in the Liyue Harbor. You have built the Jade Chamber for years, and whish to cover all the 7 nations with its shadow. Now there is a much larger stage, make it great.
